about_the_game:
Horror Manor

Step into the decaying halls of Horror Manor, an abandoned estate shrouded in mystery. Curiosity lures you deeper into its corridors, but the manor has other plans. With a sudden click, the doors slam shut, trapping you within its chilling embrace.

Face the Spirits

Explore the Manor: Navigate through decaying rooms, dusty libraries, and hidden passages, each holding a piece of the manor's tragic past.
Uncover the Secrets: Decipher cryptic clues, solve intricate puzzles, and piece together the manor's horrifying history.
Confront the Shadows: Encounter terrifying entities that lurk within the manor's darkness, their whispers echoing through the halls.
Can you escape the clutches of Horror Manor?

Features

  • Immersive Atmosphere: Experience the chilling dread of Horror Manor with haunting soundscapes and a terrifyingly realistic environment.
  • Suspenseful Exploration: Uncover hidden secrets and solve puzzles as you navigate the manor.
  • Terrifying Encounters: Face the horrifying entity lurking in the shadows.
  • Desperate Escape: Find a way out of the manor before it consumes you.

Are you brave enough to enter the Manor?

content_descriptors.notes: Horror Manor contains psychological horror, blood, bones and other spooky stuff.

name: Horror Manor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 @ 2Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 10 capable graphics card with 1GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
